entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
